TopicTitle: So Many Kerbals...So Many Hours...1k, Maybe I have no life LOL

Articles.Content:
Well...I reached 1k hours in game...That is a lot of hours. Not a single hour was wasted!

I started thinking back to when I started and one of my first crafts I took a screenshot of

To the latest aircraft that I created today, Impossicraft 3 - Stock

BTW, it is available to fly here: https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/57079260/Kerbal%20Crafts/Impossicraft%203%20-%20Stock.7z

And I think to myself, I have had so much dang fun. I regret none of it. Here's to Squad and this fantastic game that has allowed me to realize all my insane spacecraft dreams thus far!

I plan on many more flights, I have not yet begun to fly. Let the insanity continue to many more thousands of hours!

Subscribe if you want to follow the insane things I have planned.

For instance...Can Impossicraft land on the KSS Kerbin? STAY TUNED!
